de.ibm.com.opentm2scripteride.gui.custom.editor
Class CodeCompleter

java.lang.Object
  de.ibm.com.opentm2scripteride.gui.custom.editor.CodeCompleter

public class CodeCompleter
extends java.lang.Object

The code-completion backend class Merges chars to a string, checks them if the length is >2 and sets the found words to the CodeCompleterList
